---
title: "01-CleaningEnrollment"
format: html
---

```{r}
#| label: setup
#| warning: false
#| message: false

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
#| label: import

enrollment_file_list <- list.files(
  "data-raw/enrollment",
  pattern = ".csv",
  full.names = TRUE
)

enrollment_file_list
```

```{r}
#| label: combine

reading_files <- function(x) {
  df <- read_csv(x, skip = 4)
  colnames(df) <-
    c("YEAR",	
      "REGION",	
      "COUNTY NAME",	
      "DISTRICT",	"DISTRICT NAME",	
      "CHARTER STATUS",	
      "GENDER",	
      "ENROLLMENT")
}

enrollment_new <- enrollment_file_list |> map(reading_files) |> list_rbind() |> clean_names()

enrollment_new
```
